opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Lockyer, Attorney General of California v. Andrade

opinion:
535 U.S. 969

LOCKYER, ATTORNEY GENERAL OF CALIFORNIA
v.
ANDRADE.

No. 01-1127.

Supreme Court of the United States.

April 1, 2002.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, and case set for oral argument in tandem with No. 01-6978, Ewing v. California, immediately infra. Reported below: 270 F. 3d 743.
